articles.title: Pokémon Legends Z-A Update
articles.summary: New information has been revealed for Pokémon Legends Z-A.
content: A new patch is live for Pokémon Legends: Z-A. This patch brings the game up to Version 2.0.1 and features a variety of small bug fixes. The update is required to go online.
This update includes several updates and bug fixes
At Berry Stalls, it allows you to buy multiple of a Berry at once
Adds a new Berry Shop to Nouveau Café No. 3
Increases the amount of Mega Shards holdable from 999 to 9999
It also includes the following bug fixes
In Hyperspace Lumiose, it fixes an issue where the Pokémon will move in a direction other than target
Fixes an issue where the weather may not change
Fixes an issue where the Shiny version of a Mega Evolved Pokémon caught before getting Mega Dimension won't display in the Mega Evolution Pokédex
Fixes an issue where an image from an unrelated scene may display during a mission
Fixes an issue where Side Mission 188 can't be cleared if you have too many Survey Points
